org.omancode.r

Class RUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.omancode.r.RUtil

  • public final class RUtil
extends Object
    Static utility class of R related functions.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String asNullString(Object o)
      Returns o as a String, unless it is null and then return the string "NULL".

      Returns a string representing the boolean value in R.

    • Method Detail

      • readRFile

        public static String readRFile(File file)
                        throws IOException
        Returns contents of an R file. Removes "\r" in the string, because R doesn't like them.
        Parameters:
        file - text file
        Returns:
        contents of text file with "\r" removed
        Throws:
        IOException - if file cannot be read.

      • readRStream

        public static String readRStream(InputStream stream)
                          throws IOException
        Returns contents of an InputStream. Removes "\r" in the string, because R doesn't like them.
        Parameters:
        stream - stream
        Returns:
        contents of text file with "\r" removed
        Throws:
        IOException - if file cannot be read.

      • rBoolean

        public static String rBoolean(boolean bool)
        Returns a string representing the boolean value in R.
        Parameters:
        bool - boolean
        Returns:
        "TRUE", or "FALSE"

      • toVectorExprString

        public static String toVectorExprString(String[] strs)
        Returns a vector expression string, eg: c("a","b","c") from the supplied strings.
        Parameters:
        strs - string array to turn into vector expression
        Returns:
        vector expression

      • asNullString

        public static String asNullString(Object o)

        Returns:
